text: Kogo rukovodit Bog, tot idet pryamo; a kogo On vvedet v zabluzhdeniye, tot ne naydet sebe pokrovitelya, krome Yego. V den' voskreseniya My soberem ikh, kazhdogo lichno, i oni yavyatsya i slepymi, i nemymi, i glukhimi: zhilishchem im budet geyenna, i kazhdyy raz, kak budet potukhat' ona, My usilim plamya yeye
